name: Confédération des Syndicats Chrétiens
membership:
ETUC  European Trade Union Confederation
ITUC  International Trade Union Confederation
goal: ACV-CSC is the largest Belgian Trade Union, defending the rights and interests of 1.600.000 affiliates
interests: Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, External Relations, Internal Market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Politiques d'emploi, politiques sociales, politiques macroéconomiques, Better regulation et REFIT, justice fiscale,
